item.title: Follina - RCE Exploit in msdt (CVE-2022-30190)
item.description: Last week a group of researchers at neo_sec came across an intersting maldoc that uses a remote HTTP template inorder to achieve RCE. original tweet: This malicious document loads a remote HTML temlpate and launch ms-msdt (Microsoft Diagnostic Tool) with special parameters that enable code execution. This method doesn’t requires enabling the content because it doesn’t relay on Macros. In addition this CVE is even allows code execution from preview view which makes it a 0Click exploit.
